pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.1.26: “Support” renders nissaya. See Appendix I: Technical Term for discussion.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.2.16: “Outside the gateway” renders bahidvārakoṭṭhaka (in the previous sentence). See Appendix I: Technical Term for a discussion of the word koṭṭhaka.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:2.1: “Sitting (blanket)” renders nisīdana. See Appendix I: Technical Term for discussion.
